verses.verse: <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G846>yourselves<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> entrance <S%G1529>in<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> it <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> in <S%G2756>vain<s%>:

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> after that we had suffered <S%G4310>before<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> were shamefully <S%G5195>entreated<s%>, <S%G2531>as<s%> ye <S%G1492>know<s%>, <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G5375>Philippi<s%>, we were <S%G3955>bold<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G73>contention<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3874>exhortation<s%> was <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4106>deceit<s%>, <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G167>uncleanness<s%>, <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1388>guile<s%>:

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> we were <S%G1381>allowed<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> to be put in <S%G4100>trust<s%> with the <S%G2098>gospel<s%>, even <S%G3779>so<s%> we <S%G2980>speak<s%>; <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G700>pleasing<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, which <S%G1381>trieth<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> at any <S%G4218>time<s%> used <S%G1096>we<s%> <S%G2850>flattering<s%> <S%G1722%G3056>words<s%>, <S%G2531>as<s%> ye <S%G1492>know<s%>, <S%G3777>nor<s%> a <S%G1722%G4392>cloke<s%> of <S%G4124>covetousness<s%>; <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G3144>witness<s%>:

<S%G3777>Nor<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G2212>sought<s%> we <S%G1391>glory<s%>, <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, <S%G3777>nor<s%> yet <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G243>others<s%>, when we <S%G1410>might<s%> have <S%G1511>been<s%> <S%G1722%G922>burdensome<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G652>apostles<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

<S%G235>But<s%> we <S%G1096>were<s%> <S%G2261>gentle<s%> <S%G1722%G3319>among<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, even <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G5162>nurse<s%> <S%G302%G2282>cherisheth<s%> <S%G1438>her<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%>:

<S%G3779>So<s%> being affectionately <S%G2442>desirous<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%>, we were <S%G2106>willing<s%> to have <S%G3330>imparted<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> our <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G5590>souls<s%>, <S%G1360>because<s%> ye <S%G1096>were<s%> <S%G27>dear<s%> unto <S%G2254>us<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> ye <S%G3421>remember<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2873>labour<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3449>travail<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G2038>labouring<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%>, <S%G4314>because<s%> we <S%G1912>would<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> be <S%G1912>chargeable<s%> unto <S%G5100>any<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%>, we <S%G2784>preached<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G5210>Ye<s%> are <S%G3144>witnesses<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> also, <S%G5613>how<s%> <S%G3743>holily<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1346>justly<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G274>unblameably<s%> we behaved <S%G1096>ourselves<s%> among <S%G5213>you<s%> that <S%G4100>believe<s%>:

<S%G2509>As<s%> ye <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G5613>how<s%> we <S%G3870>exhorted<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3888>comforted<s%> and <S%G3140>charged<s%> <S%G1538>every<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G5209%G5216>you<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G3962>father<s%> doth <S%G1438>his<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%>,

<S%G2532><s%><S%G1519>That<s%> <S%G5209>ye<s%> would <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G516>worthy<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, who hath <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G1438>his<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>.

For <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G1223>cause<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2168>thank<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> without <S%G89>ceasing<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%>, when ye <S%G3880>received<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> which ye <S%G189>heard<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>, ye <S%G1209>received<s%> it <S%G3756>not<s%> as the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> in <S%G230>truth<s%>, the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> effectually <S%G1754>worketh<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> that <S%G4100>believe<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G3402>followers<s%> of the <S%G1577>churches<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2449>Judaea<s%> <S%G5607>are<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> have <S%G3958>suffered<s%> like <S%G5024>things<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> your <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G4853>countrymen<s%>, <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> they <S%G846>have<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>:

Who <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G615>killed<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> have <S%G1559>persecuted<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G700>please<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> are <S%G1727>contrary<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>:

<S%G2967>Forbidding<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%> to the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they might be <S%G4982>saved<s%>, <S%G1519>to<s%> fill <S%G378>up<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%> <S%G3842>alway<s%>: <S%G1161>for<s%> the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> is <S%G5348>come<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G5056>uttermost<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, being <S%G642>taken<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G4314>for<s%> a <S%G5610>short<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> in <S%G4383>presence<s%>, <S%G3756>not<s%> in <S%G2588>heart<s%>, <S%G4704>endeavoured<s%> the more <S%G4056>abundantly<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G1939>desire<s%>.

<S%G1352>Wherefore<s%> we <S%G2309>would<s%> have <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G3303>even<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, <S%G2532%G530>once<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1364>again<s%>; <S%G2532>but<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G1465>hindered<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G2746%G2228>rejoicing<s%>? Are <S%G3780>not<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> in the <S%G1715>presence<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3952>coming<s%>?
